text: Interstate 440 (I-440), also known as the Four-Forty Parkway or the Debra K. Johnson Memorial Parkway, is an eastâ€“west auxiliary Interstate Highway in the city of Nashville in the U.S. state of Tennessee. It is a southern bypass around downtown Nashville. Its west end is at I-40. Its east end is at I-24 and I-40. The highway also meets I-65. The highway is long. ==References== 440 Category:Transport in Tennessee
title: Interstate 440 (Tennessee)
